trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for types that represent a panel item on a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe base para tipos que representam um item do painel no painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionItem class serves as an abstract base for classes that represent individual panel items in a smart tag panel, which represents a menu-like user interface (UI) for smart tags.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignerActionItem serve como um resumo base para classes que representam os itens do painel individual no painel de marcas inteligentes, que representa uma interface de menu como usuário (UI) de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] supplies derived classes that represent the different common entries in a smart tag panel, including plain text, header text, properties and methods of the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class, and designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] fornece as classes derivadas que representam as entradas comuns diferentes no painel de marcas inteligentes, incluindo texto sem formatação, o texto do cabeçalho, propriedades e métodos de associado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe e verbos do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: Typically, your `DesignerAction` feature is defined in a programmer-supplied class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, which contains a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method that groups individual panel items together to form the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o `DesignerAction` recurso é definido em uma classe fornecida pelo programador derivada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, que contém um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>método que agrupa os itens do painel individuais para formar o painel de marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> types are associated with members of the class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> objects are activated when their associated panel entry is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>tipos estão associados aos membros da classe derivada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>objetos são ativados quando sua entrada no painel associada é selecionada pelo usuário.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Forms and dialog boxes can be displayed by members of the class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Formulários e caixas de diálogo podem ser exibidas por membros da classe derivada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: By default, the parent of these windows will be the container window for the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o pai dessas janelas será a janela de contêiner para o painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Explicitly parenting these child windows to another service or window may cause items to display improperly.
trans-unit.target: Explicitamente domínio pai essas janelas filho de outro serviço ou janela pode fazer com que itens a serem exibidos incorretamente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> is an abstract class, the DesignerActionItem constructor is intended to be called from derived classes only.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>é uma classe abstrata, o construtor destina-se a ser chamado de apenas as classes derivadas de DesignerActionItem.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como o `category` parâmetro é usado para agrupar itens em um painel, consulte o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The panel text for this item.
trans-unit.target: O texto do painel para este item.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive <xref:System.String> that defines the groupings of panel entries.
trans-unit.target: O diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas <xref:System.String>que define os agrupamentos de entradas de painel.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Supplemental text for this item, potentially used in ToolTips or the status bar.
trans-unit.target: Texto complementar para este item, potencialmente usados em dicas de ferramenta ou a barra de status.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow this item to be placed into a group of items that have the same <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category*> property value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deseja permitir que este item para ser colocado em um grupo de itens que têm o mesmo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category*>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category*>

trans-unit.source: Because multiple <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects may be combined to form a single smart tag panel, the AllowAssociate property indicates whether the current item can be rearranged by category.
trans-unit.target: Como vários <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos podem ser combinados para formar um painel de marcas inteligentes único, a propriedade AllowAssociate indica se o item atual pode ser reorganizado por categoria.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The AllowAssociate property is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A> property on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> types.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AllowAssociate é usada em conjunto com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>tipos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, ASP.NET uses a data-bound control like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> to connect to a data source control like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o ASP.NET usa um controle associado a dados para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>se conectar a um controle de fonte de dados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Both have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> with its own set of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ambos têm um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>com seu próprio conjunto de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has items like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, `Edit Fields`, and `AutoFormat`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle tem itens, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, `Edit Fields`, e `AutoFormat`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class has `Configure` and `Refresh Items`, which have AllowAssociate set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>classe tem `Configure` e `Refresh Items`, que tem AllowAssociate definido como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> item has a related component, which is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>item possui um componente relacionado, que é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: All the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object's items that have AllowAssociate set to `true` are automatically included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's action list.
trans-unit.target: Todos os a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>itens do objeto com AllowAssociate definido como `true` são incluídos automaticamente no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>lista de ação do controle da.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how the two lists are merged in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's designer action list.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra como as duas listas são mescladas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>lista de ação designer do controle da.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: |GridView items|SqlDataSource items| |--------------------|-------------------------| |- `DataSourceID` (related component = `SqlDataSource`)
trans-unit.target: | Itens de GridView | Itens de SqlDataSource | |--------------------|-------------------------| |- `DataSourceID` (componente relacionado = `SqlDataSource`)

trans-unit.source: - Edit Fields
trans-unit.target: -Editar campos

trans-unit.source: - AutoFormat|- Configure (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)
trans-unit.target: -AutoFormatação |-configurar (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)

trans-unit.source: - Refresh (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)| |Merged GridView control's smart tasks panel| |-------------------------------------------------| |- DataSourceID
trans-unit.target: - Refresh (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)| | Mesclar o painel de tarefas inteligentes do controle GridView | |-------------------------------------------------| |-DataSourceID

trans-unit.source: - Configure
trans-unit.target: -Configurar

trans-unit.source: - Refresh
trans-unit.target: -Atualização

trans-unit.source: - Edit Fields
trans-unit.target: -Editar campos

trans-unit.source: - AutoFormat|
trans-unit.target: -AutoFormatação |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item can be grouped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item pode ser agrupado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the group name for an item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do grupo para um item.

trans-unit.source: Item categories are defined by their names, which are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Categorias de item são definidas por seus nomes, que diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how items are grouped by category, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como os itens são agrupados por categoria, consulte o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the group that the item is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o que o item é um membro do grupo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the supplemental text for the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto complementar para o item.

trans-unit.source: The Description property is used whenever a plain text description of the item is required (for example, in ToolTips and the status bar).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de descrição é usada sempre que uma descrição de texto sem formatação do item é necessário (por exemplo, em dicas de ferramenta e a barra de status).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is set in the constructor for this class.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade é definido no construtor para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the descriptive text for the item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o texto descritivo para o item.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text for this item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto para este item.

trans-unit.source: The value of the DisplayName property is set in the constructor for this class.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade DisplayName é definido no construtor para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the display text for the item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o texto exibido para o item.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection that can be used to store programmer-defined key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência a uma coleção que pode ser usada para armazenar pares chave/valor definidos pelo programador.

trans-unit.source: The Properties property allows the programmer to store arbitrary data within an item.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Properties permite que o programador armazenar dados arbitrários dentro de um item.

trans-unit.source: The standard properties for this class, such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A>, are not stored in this collection.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades padrão para essa classe, como <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A>, não são armazenados na coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of this property is actually <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo dessa propriedade é realmente <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A collection that implements <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que implementa <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item appears in source code view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este item aparece na exibição de código fonte.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this item appears in source code view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este item aparece no modo de exibição de código fonte; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
